title: Industrial Circus Atmos & Ringmaster Dialogue
description: Collection of Circus Tent Construction Ambiences & Ringmaster Crowd Announcements & Dialogue
longDescription:
Step into the captivating world of the circus with "Circus Ambiences," an extraordinary collection for game developers. Immerse your players in the behind-the-scenes realm of a traveling circus with this impressive assortment of ambiences and sound effects.


Experience the awe-inspiring creation of the magnificent big-top tent as you listen to the industrial construction sounds, capturing the essence of the circus setting. The gentle hum of generators and the subtle whirr of air conditioning transport your players to the heart of the circus atmosphere.


Moreover, this collection features a selection of customer announcements by the ringmaster, presented in both dry and wet versions with reverb, allowing for versatile usage and customization options that align with your game's unique vision.


Unparalleled in its scarcity, this remarkable assortment of sounds offers an exclusive glimpse into the hidden world of the circus. It is perfectly suited for game projects in need of construction/industrial ambiences, captivating circus sound effects, and immersive room tones. Let your players be transported to the enchanting and magical world of the circus through meticulously crafted files that will elevate the audio experience of your game.


Enhance your Game with the meticulously curated sounds of "Circus Ambiences" and unlock the extraordinary sonic landscape of the circus like never before. Your players will be captivated by the immersive and authentic atmosphere that this collection brings.


https://soundcloud.com/user-444466580/circus-construction-atmos-demo?si=1db5b9f87de64d90ae4ff2494a08c1ae&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


https://vimeo.com/820242126?share=copy
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Mac & Windows Supported
  •  29 Unique Files, 23 Ambience/Atmos, 6 SFX. 34 Total files (5 modified)
  •  16 Bit, 48kHz
  • No Looping
  • 53 Minutes of Audio
